testcase.name: schemavalidation

failure.message: src-import.3.1: The namespace attribute, 'https://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/', of an <import> element information item must be identical to the targetNamespace attribute, 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/', of the imported document.
